result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Michelle A Dantonio in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Pursuant to negotiations, case is DISMISSED BUT READ IN for the purpose of sentencing in case number 2015CM002476.
Justice Point Program Pretrial Report dated 03/01/2016; received and filed.

-Attorney Robert Hampton III in court requesting to reschedule February 29, 2016 at 8:30 a.m. scheduling conference.   Court ordered case adjourned for scheduling conference in Branch 31 on March 2, 2016 at 8:30 a.m.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Michelle A Dantonio in court.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference on 2/29/16 at 8:30 am, Branch 31.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office.

Attorney Robert J Hampton in court.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Pretrial conference.  Defendant not present.  On state's motion, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued with remand to commissioner.
JusticePoint Pretrial Report, received and filed.

Defendant Michelle A Dantonio in court with attorney Robert J. Hampton.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Status of counsel held off the record. Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 31.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Program report dated January 14, 2016; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with John M. and Mt. Sinai Hospital.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Michelle A Dantonio in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  Defendant Michelle A Dantonio in custody.  William Patrick Pipp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rifelj, Branch 31.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Status conference scheduled for January 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
